responses.text: You're welcome Is there anything I can assist you with today?
Of course Susan! Here's the plan for your reference
By the way, are you planning to go for a home loan or will you be self-funding?
Got it! Would you like an NOC for the loan? Also, let me know if you need any other documents.

Based on what most banks usually ask, here's a list. Let me know if your bank needs anything else:

• NOC
• Developer's PAN Card
• RERA Certificate
• Company Incorporation Document
• Allotment or Agreement Letter
Absolutely! Once I have them, I'll share. For now, I can send you the booking amount receipt — shall I?
Noted. Just to keep you in the loop — I'll also update you on payment reminders and construction progress.
Of course, Susan! I'll schedule a call with Ray from Design at 6:00 PM today. Would that work for you?
Perfect! You're all set for 6 PM today, April 25th. Let me know if you need anything else.
Great! I'm here if anything comes up.
